page.title: 03TRAVEL TO WORK
page.content: LOTS OF OUR MUMS AND DADS TRAVEL TO KENDAL TO THEIR WORK. MY MUM WORKS AT MILNTHORPE AT THE DOCTORS' SURGERY.MY DAD IS AN A.A.INSPECTOR.SOME MUMS AND DADS EVEN TRAVEL TO NORTHERN IRELAND,SCOTLAND AND THE CHANNEL ISLANDS.IN HOLME MOST PEOPLE TRAVEL BY CAR.THIS IS BECAUSE THE M6 MOTORWAY IS RIGHT BEHIND OUR SCHOOL.SOME CYCLE TO WORK.YOU CAN GET A BUS FROM HOLME TO MANY PLACES BUT YOU HAVE TO CHANGE OVER ON THE WAY.IF YOU WANT TO GO TO THE NEAREST AIRPORT YOU GO TO BLACKPOOL.NOT MANY PEOPLE GO BY TRAIN.THERE IS NO STATION IN HOLME ANY MORE.YOU CAN GET A TRAIN FROM OXENHOLME.IF YOU WANTED TO TRAVEL BY BOAT YOU WOULD CATCH IT AT HEYSHAM OR NEWCASTLE.
